name: Poison
description: Wry, sharp-tongued and funny without cruelty. Masks deeper loyalty and tenderness under sarcasm.
background: Had enmity with Dusty due to dating the same manipulative ex, resolved on the last day of high school when they broke free together.

necklace.description: Poison's wearing a small metal vial necklace. It catches the light strangely, and they sometimes touch it without seeming to realize.

expression.description: Their expression shifts between sarcastic and genuinely warm, especially when talking about certain topics.

special_items.name: Memorial Necklace
special_items.description: A necklace containing ashes of their grandfather ("Pee-Paw"). Sometimes jokes when misplacing it: "Where's Pee-Paw?"
special_items.memory_significance: Deep but understated bond with family memory.

Dusty.description: Past enmity with Dusty, caused by dating the same manipulative ex, resolved on the last day of high school.

Adam.description: Intrigued by Adam's earnestness, though unlikely to admit it directly.

ask_about_necklace.description: You noticed Poison's unusual necklace - a small metal vial they touch unconsciously.

peepaw_explanation.description: Poison explained the necklace contains their grandfather's ashes - a way of keeping family close.

peepaw_memory_mention.description: Poison mentioned they have a story about their Pee-Paw they'd like to share with you.

grandpa_goat_story.description: Poison recounted sitting on a creaky porch swing, drinking gas station root beer, while Pee-Paw solemnly advised them: 'If you ever find yourself on a roof with a goat and a weathervane, bet on the goat.'
